ihs.apcs.spacebattle

Class Environment<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • ihs.apcs.spacebattle.Environment<T>
  • Type Parameters:
    T - specify the corresponding Game class to that being played on the server. Corresponds to the same class used by the Spaceship interface.
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    BasicEnvironment

    public class Environment<T>
extends java.lang.Object
    A class to represent the state of the world at the time a command is requested. An Environment is passed to the Spaceship.getNextCommand(Environment) method of the Spaceship class to inform the ship of the current state of your ship and the world. The Environment may contain additional information based on performing other commands like RadarCommand.
    Since:
    0.1

      • getRadarLevel

        public int getRadarLevel()
        Gets the level of the last radar sweep, if the last command issued was a RadarCommand.
        Returns:
        the level of radar sweep performed by the RadarCommand.

      • getRadar

        public RadarResults getRadar()
        Gets the results of the most recent radar sweep, if and only if the last command issued was a RadarCommand.
        Returns:
        results of the radar sweep performed with the last RadarCommand, or null if the last command issued was not a radar sweep

      • getGameInfo

        public T getGameInfo()
        Gets information concerning the current game objective.
        Returns:

      • equals

        public boolean equals(Environment<T> other)
        Determines if this Environment is the same as another one. Two Environments are equal if they contain all the same data.
        Parameters:
        other - the Environment to compare to
        Returns:
        true if the Environments are equal, false otherwise
